title: My champion  get freeze and unable to play.
body: When i play LOL matches at some point of them match my champ freeze and he becomes unable to move.then after sometime it says due to prolong inactivity game will now exit.i tried disconnecting and reconnecting no use .  plz help me.now u put me in a lower priority queue which is unfair.I ve waited like 5*20 of queues like 5 times.I thought it was a game on my  game.but recently i gave my game to one of my friends and he plays fine.plz tell me how to solve this and ls stop this lower priority queue which is unfair.sorry for english.reply soon. NOT EVERY GAME IS FREEZED.

replies.body: Just some information needed. What operating system are you on and who's your internet service provider? Are you still currently experiencing these disconnections?
